com.orchestranetworks.ui
Class UIFormLabelSpec.DocumentationPane

java.lang.Object
  com.orchestranetworks.ui.UIFormLabelSpec.DocumentationPane
Enclosing class:
UIFormLabelSpec
public static final class UIFormLabelSpec.DocumentationPane
extends Object

Describes the content of a documentation pane. A documentation pane is a pop-up displayed near the label's node.

Constructor Detail

UIFormLabelSpec.DocumentationPane

public UIFormLabelSpec.DocumentationPane(Path aPathInDataModel,
                                         boolean isAdvancedInfo)
Class constructor for standard node's documentation. In this mode, the data model's node corresponding to the specified path is retrieved from the data space and data set currently selected in the user session and its information is displayed in the standard way.

Implementation note: in addition to be standard, one benefit of this mode is that the pane is built by means of an Ajax request. Hence it is light-weight regarding the page container.

Parameters:
aPathInDataModel - The path of the data model's node whose documentation is to be displayed. The path must concern the data space and data set currently selected in the user interface.
isAdvancedInfo - true to display the advanced information, false otherwise. The advanced information provides technical information, such as the type and the path.

Method Detail

setTitle

public void setTitle(String aTitle)
Specifies the title of the documentation pane. In standard node's documentation mode, this is the label (osd:label) of the current node.

Throws:
IllegalStateException - If this pane has been built in standard node's documentation mode.

setTitle

Specifies the title of the documentation pane. In standard node's documentation mode, this is the label (osd:label) of the current node.

Throws:

addBlock

public void addBlock(String aText)
Specifies an additional paragraph in a free section.

This method is equivalent to:

DocumentationPane.addBlock(null, value)
